course_name: Science 21, Earth and Environmental Science: Specialist Teaching Area
description: This course is designed to challenge preservice teachers to use their knowledge, expertise and experience to design learning environments that will engage students in the learning process and cater for a variety of learning styles. This includes the understanding of and skills to teach, multi-strand science to broad range of students to Year 12. Includes design principles, teaching strategies and assessment criteria.
restricted: Entry to the Graduate Diploma of Education (Secondary) or entry to Bachelor of Education (Secondary) (Dual degree) professional year.
